name: 5th Global Conference on Agriculture
content: The 5th Global Conference on Agriculture, scheduled for March 13-15, 2025, in Berlin, Germany, is not simply an event—it’s a platform that sparks important conversations. Bringing together scientists, researchers, PhD candidates, graduate students, and other members of academia, this conference is an opportunity to actively participate in shaping the future of agriculture. Attendees can uncover trends, learn unique perspectives, and engage in group discussions; present their research, receive feedback from peers, and get published in prestigious academic journals; and take the next step in their academic careers by identifying new research opportunities and partners. Additionally, the conference provides a unique networking opportunity with members of non-profit and for-profit organizations and research institutions. Participants will also have the chance to explore the beauty of Berlin and indulge in the local cuisine. The conference offers publication opportunities for accepted and registered abstracts in the Conference Proceedings or various journals, with Conference Proceedings published with an ISBN number in soft copy. Full papers will undergo a double-blind review process, and accepted papers will be published electronically with a DOI number. Important Dates: Early Registration Deadline: 12 November 2024 Abstract Submission Deadline: 27 February 2025 Final Registration Deadline: 6 March 2025 Attendees can also enjoy a free city tour, adding an extra layer of cultural enrichment to this invaluable academic experience.
